name: Popup Box – new WordPress popup plugin
author: Wow-Company

sections.description:
Effortless Popup Creation – Popup Box for WordPress

Popup Box – WordPress plugin for easily create popups with live preview. Create your own amazing pop-ups using many style options and display options.

The ability to insert shortcodes to the popup content allows you to use many plugins to create forms (for example Contact Form 7) and something else.

Popup Box features

  • Live Preview: See your popup come to life as you create it with the intuitive live preview feature.
  • Unlimited Popups: Craft as many popups as you need for different campaigns and purposes.
    Customization Options: Tailor your popups to your brand with a wide range of style options for fonts, colors, backgrounds, and borders.
    Flexible Triggers: Choose when your popups appear based on user actions (clicks, scrolls) or show when page load with a set delay.
    Shortcode Support: Embed forms, videos, and other content from your favorite plugins using shortcodes within your popups.
    Targeted Display: Control where your popups appear by specifying specific pages or targeting the entire site.
  • Advanced Features:
    • Rich popup content editor for detailed control
    • One-time popup display per user
    • Delay timer for popup appearance
    • 9 precise popup placement options
    • Customizable close button appearance
    • Image or color backgrounds for popups
    • Optional page overlay with popups
    • Popup shadow effects
    • Control popup closing behavior (overlay click, Esc key)
    • Lightweight design (no jQuery or cookies)
    • GDPR compliant

Unlock even more functionality by using Popup Box with these free plugins:

  • Buttons: Create call-to-action buttons and more within your popups. (Buttons Plugin Link: https://wordpress.org/plugins/buttons/)
  • Counter Box: Design engaging countdown timers and information banners. (Counter Box Plugin Link: https://wordpress.org/plugins/counter-box/)
  • Floating Button: Easily create a custom sticky floating buttons. (Floating Button Plugin Link: https://wordpress.org/plugins/floating-button/)
  • Calculator Builder: A simple way to create an online calculator. (Calculator Builder Plugin Link: https://wordpress.org/plugins/calculator-builder/)

Boost your website’s engagement and conversions with Popup Box! Get started today!

PRO Version

Check the PRO version

  • Open by Hover Showcase your popup when users hover over a specific element.
  • Right Click Trigger the popup upon a user’s right-click action.
  • Selected Text Prompt the popup to appear when a user selects text on your page.
  • Exit Intent Capture visitors’ attention as they attempt to leave your website (ideal for exit-intent campaigns).
  • Loop Display the popup multiple times with random intervals for sustained engagement.
  • Activate by URL Target specific pages based on URL parameters (e.g., show a discount popup only on page with URL parameter).
  • Activate by Referrer URL Tailor popup experiences for visitors arriving from particular websites (e.g., display a welcome message to users coming from a partner site).
  • Geotargeting Take your popups to the next level with geotargeting functionality! This powerful plugin feature allows you to display targeted popups based on the country location of your website visitors.
  • Forced Interaction Briefly disable the close button to ensure users see your crucial information or complete an action (use with caution).
  • Redirect on Close Optionally redirect visitors to another URL after closing the popup.
  • Auto Close Set a delay to automatically close the popup after a certain amount of time.
  • Video Support Seamlessly integrate videos into your popups for engaging multimedia presentations.
  • Responsive Visibility Choose to hide the popup on mobile or desktop devices to optimize for different screen sizes.
  • Display Rules Control exactly where your popup appear using page types, post categories/tags, author pages, taxonomies and date archives.
  • Scheduling Schedule popup appearances based on specific days, times, and dates. This allows you to promote temporary events or campaigns without cluttering your website permanently.
  • User Role Define which user roles (e.g., Administrator, Editor, Author) have the ability to see the popup. This can be helpful for displaying internal popups relevant only to website administrators or for specific user groups.
  • Multi-Language For websites catering to a global audience, Popup Box Pro allows you to restrict popup visibility to specific languages. This ensures users only see button relevant to their chosen language setting.
  • Browsers Deactivate popups selectively for specific browsers.
  • Animation Effects Choose from 28 different animation transitions to enhance your popup’s visual appeal.
  • Lightweight & Efficient The plugin operates without jQuery, relying solely on JavaScript for efficient performance.
  • GDPR Compliant The plugin leverages a cookie-free approach, ensuring compliance with data privacy regulations.

Demo the PRO version

sections.installation:
• Installation option 1: Find and install this plugin in the Plugins -> Add new section of your wp-admin
  • Installation option 2: Download the zip file, then upload the plugin via the wp-admin in the Plugins -> Add new section. Or unzip the archive and upload the folder to the plugins directory /wp-content/plugins/ via ftp
  • Press Activate when you have installed the plugin via dashboard or press Activate in the in the Plugins list
  • Go to Popup Box section that will appear in your main menu on the left
  • Click Add new to create your first menu
  • Setup your popup
  • Click Save
